alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Pawnee; Saline; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 11:46PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Seward, northeastern Jefferson, Saline, southwestern Pawnee and Gage Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1146 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles southeast of Tobias to 3 miles southeast of Vermillion. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Western, Daykin and Tobias around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Friend, Dorchester and Beaver Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
